Room.Name: Reclaimation Center
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a rather sophisticated refuse management facility.
Room.LongDescription: As you enter the center, you first notice how clean it is. It still smells, of course, but no where near as bad as Brownhaven. As you drop items in the reclaimation center, it returns money, in appreciation of not just dumping your junk in the mountains somewhere. On the wall you see a sign which says "Thank You For Recycling - Have a Nice Day".
